metadata.title: CVE-2023-52607 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:powerpc/mm: Fix null-pointer dereference in pgtable_cache_addkasprintf() returns a pointer to dynamically allocated memorywhich can be NULL upon failure. Ensure the allocation was successfulby checking the pointer validity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
